# OmniStream Configuration
# This file is automatically generated and can be edited

# Google Drive Settings
GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID=1DQDRFQtl7fkgyXoP-sqRENau2WCLJH18
GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_NAME=OmniStream_Downloads

# Download Organization
# Template: %(uploader)s/%(title)s_%(id)s.%(ext)s
# - %(uploader)s = Creator/Channel name (creates folder per creator)
# - %(title)s = Original video title
# - %(id)s = Unique video ID (ensures no duplicates)
# - %(ext)s = File extension (mp4, webm, etc.)

# Example output:
# MrBeast/Amazing_Video_Title_dQw4w9WgXcQ.mp4
# MrBeast/Another_Cool_Video_abc123xyz.mp4

# Quality Settings
DEFAULT_QUALITY=best
DEFAULT_MODE=video

# Anti-Detection
ENABLE_STEALTH=true
RANDOM_DELAY_MIN=5
RANDOM_DELAY_MAX=15
